```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
dice <- function() {
  sample(1:6, 1)
}

roll_dice <- function(n) {
  results <- vector(mode = "integer", length = n)
  for (i in 1:n) {
    results[i] <- dice() + dice()
  }
  return (results)
}

x <- tibble(rolls = roll_dice(10000))
ggplot(x, aes(x = rolls)) + 
  geom_histogram(bins = 50, binwidth = 1, color = "white")
```
